rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
梅奥诊所研究人员提倡跨血统进行全面的 TPMT 基因分型梅奥诊所的研究人员发现，TPMT*8 等位基因的基因变异与硫嘌呤类药物的代谢减少有关。 TPMT*8 在非洲人或非裔美国人后裔中相对常见。爱思唯尔发表在《分子诊断杂志》上的一项新研究详细介绍了研究人员的目标，即提供可在临床上用于预测对所有患者有益的药物反应的药物基因组测试，无论其祖先背景如何。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Mayo-Clinic-researchers-advocate-for-compressive-TPMT-genotyping-across-ancestries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Mayo-Clinic-researchers-advocate-for-compressive-TPMT-genotyping-across-ancestries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4db1eb9d-f0f4-4d12-bc42-57bc2458636f Wed, 11 Dec 2024 01:51:43 -0500 Mayo Clinic researchers advocate for comprehensive TPMT genotyping across ancestries
新型生物材料提高大脑起搏器的信噪比两年前，一位医学专业人士向伊朗大不里士大学的科学家提出了一个有趣的问题：患者在植入起搏器后出现头痛。他们共同调查，开始怀疑根本问题是否在于起搏器所使用的材料。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/New-biomaterials-improve-signal-to-noise-ratio-in-brain-pacemakers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/New-biomaterials-improve-signal-to-noise-ratio-in-brain-pacemakers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=edcbb215-5d58-41aa-bb32-bfe24402dbf6 Wed, 11 Dec 2024 01:45:29 -0500 New biomaterials improve signal-to-noise ratio in brain pacemakers
PGE2 水平升高会导致与年龄相关的皮肤变化和癌症风险一篇新的研究论文发表在Aging（被MEDLINE/PubMed列为“Aging (Albany NY)”和Web of Science的“Aging-US”）2024年11月18日第16卷第21期，题为“前列腺素E2调节原代人角质形成细胞的衰老和衰老后肿瘤逃逸。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Elevated-PGE2-levels-drive-age-lated-skin-changes-and-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Elevated-PGE2-levels-drive-age-lated-skin-changes-and-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1421f4bb-319d-4a24-95ae-08d6c082b446 Wed, 11 Dec 2024 01:30:25 -0500 Elevated PGE2 levels drive age-related skin changes and cancer risk
神经科学揭示社会奖励和关系价值如何推动人际关系南加州大学的新研究表明，虽然痛苦，但社会拒绝可以成为一种强大的学习工具。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Neuroscience-reveals-how-social-rewards-and-relational-value-drive- human-connection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Neuroscience-reveals-how-social-rewards-and-relational-value-drive- human-connection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=843b22d8-1ca6-430d-aae4-9c407c5de83b Wed, 11 Dec 2024 01:17:46 -0500 Neuroscience reveals how social rewards and relational value drive human connection
研究显示加速衰老与早发性结直肠癌有关迈阿密大学米勒医学院西尔维斯特综合癌症中心的新研究表明，一个人的生物学年龄可能高于他或她的实际年龄（称为加速衰老的概念），可以预测谁有患结肠息肉的风险，这是一种已知结直肠癌的危险因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Accelerated-aging-linked-to-early-onset-colorectal-cancer-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Accelerated-aging-linked-to-early-onset-colorectal-cancer-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=52e72f96-7b2c-4d69-8f7c-902c53e079b1 Wed, 11 Dec 2024 01:02:14 -0500 Accelerated aging linked to early-onset colorectal cancer, study shows
超加工食品在美国家庭饮食中占主导地位约翰·霍普金斯大学彭博公共卫生学院的研究人员领导的一项新分析发现，美国成年人在家消耗的卡路里一半以上来自超加工食品。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Ultra-processed-foods-dominate-American-home-diets.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Ultra-processed-foods-dominate-American-home-diets.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=86739130-d791-4fc6-9df6-25ce71a684a7 Wed, 11 Dec 2024 00:47:00 -0500 Ultra-processed foods dominate American home diets
健康的植物性饮食如何增强老年人的力量和功能一项研究将健康的植物性饮食与改善老年人的身体机能和力量联系起来，强调饮食质量而不是数量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/How-healthy-plant-based-diets-enhance-strength-and-function-in-aging-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/How-healthy-plant-based-diets-enhance-strength-and-function-in-aging-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4c850005-c911-4596-80a1-fcfdf8fd36c1 Tue, 10 Dec 2024 23:43:00 -0500 How healthy plant-based diets enhance strength and function in aging adults
肝硬化冠状动脉疾病的系统评价和荟萃分析冠状动脉疾病（CAD）在肝硬化患者中越来越常见。然而，有关肝硬化患者 CAD 发病率和患病率的数据存在差异，且相关性仍不确定。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Systematic-review-and-meta-analysis-of-coronary-artery-disease-in-liver-cirrhosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Systematic-review-and-meta-analysis-of-coronary-artery-disease-in-liver-cirrosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4debe7c0-2903-4f9e-8acc-51ad33984175 Tue, 10 Dec 2024 23:35:09 -0500 Systematic review and meta-analysis of coronary artery disease in liver cirrhosis
专门项目为患有边缘性人格障碍的母亲带来希望抚养孩子并不是一件容易的事，与其他成年人相比，父母始终更有可能经历巨大的压力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Specialized-program-offers-hope-for-mothers-struggling-with-borderline-personality-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Specialized-program-offers-hope-for-mothers-struggling-with-borderline-personality-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b141d46-ff01-4e27-b883-0bc4e7fd7a85 Tue, 10 Dec 2024 23:27:00 -0500 Specialized program offers hope for mothers struggling with borderline personality disorder
铁人三项表现：年龄、气候和地理如何决定成功或失败铁人三项研究揭示了比赛地点、气候和参与者人口统计如何影响表现，研究结果为铁人三项运动员争取最高成绩提供了关键指导。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Ironman-performance-How-age-climate-and-geography-make-or-break-success.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Ironman-performance-How-age-climate-and-geography-make-or-break-success.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=21b88af5-267c-4cee-a4d5-57bf8a09efa7 Tue, 10 Dec 2024 23:25:00 -0500 Ironman performance: How age, climate, and geography make or break success
